item.title: Mist in the Cowichan Valley on Vancouver Island, British Columbia, Canada
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Kevin Oke/Alamy Welcome to the Cowichan Valley on Vancouver Island in British Columbia. Located on the southern part of the island, this valley has art and history that echo through its green mountains, like Mount Prevost. The region is home to the band government of the Cowichan Tribes, the largest First Nations band in British Columbia. The city of Duncan has an impressive collection of indigenous art, including intricate carvings and paintings.
